page.title: 11LIFE AT COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL
page.content: "At about 7 a.m.I get up and wash,then I do some exercises.I get dressed into my school uniform,grey skirt,blue shirt,tie,jumper and blazer." "Once I'm dressed,I go downstairs and have my breakfast,usually a bacon sandwich.I sit and watch television until about 8 a.m.I brush my hair,and at about 8.15.a.m. I go to school on my bicycle which is a hawk." "Once at school the normal day consists of eight lessons,each lasting 35 minutes.Our school finishes early at 3.15 p.m." "It takes me 15 minutes to get home-we have tea at around 5.30p.m,then I either do homework and watch television or go out with my friends."
